name: bookish
description: A simple platform for creating readable, accessible online books.

scripts.build-assets: cp bookish.css build/; cp icons/* build/
scripts.ship: set -e -o pipefail; npm run clean; npm run build-assets; npm run build; npm run sync
scripts.build-app: node ./esbuild.backend.js; cp src/index.html public/; cp -R src/images public/; cp -R src/style public/
scripts.build: rm build/*; node ./esbuild.frontend.js | terser --compress --mangle > build/bookish.js; npm run build-assets
